name: flickr.people.getPhotos
description: Return photos from the given user's photostream. Only photos visible to the calling user will be returned. This method must be authenticated; to return public photos for a user, useflickr.people.getPublicPhotos.
authentication: This method does not require authentication.

arguments.name: api_key
arguments.description: Your API application key.See herefor more details.

arguments.name: user_id
arguments.description: The NSID of the user who's photos to return. A value of "me" will return the calling user's photos.

arguments.name: safe_search
arguments.description: Safe search setting:1 for safe.2 for moderate.3 for restricted.(Please note: Un-authed calls can only see Safe content.)

arguments.name: min_upload_date
arguments.description: Minimum upload date. Photos with an upload date greater than or equal to this value will be returned. The date should be in the form of a unix timestamp.

arguments.name: max_upload_date
arguments.description: Maximum upload date. Photos with an upload date less than or equal to this value will be returned. The date should be in the form of a unix timestamp.

arguments.name: min_taken_date
arguments.description: Minimum taken date. Photos with an taken date greater than or equal to this value will be returned. The date should be in the form of a mysql datetime.

arguments.name: max_taken_date
arguments.description: Maximum taken date. Photos with an taken date less than or equal to this value will be returned. The date should be in the form of a mysql datetime.

arguments.name: content_types
arguments.description: Comma-separated list of content types to return:0 for photos.1 for screenshots.2 for 'other'.3 for virtual photos.

arguments.name: privacy_filter
arguments.description: Return photos only matching a certain privacy level. This only applies when making an authenticated call to view photos you own. Valid values are:1 public photos2 private photos visible to friends3 private photos visible to family4 private photos visible to friends & family5 completely private photos

arguments.name: content_type
arguments.description:
DEPRECATED. Use content_types instead.

Content Type setting:1 for photos only.2 for screenshots only.3 for 'other' only.4 for photos and screenshots.5 for screenshots and 'other'.6 for photos and 'other'.7 for photos, screenshots, and 'other' (all).

arguments.name: extras
arguments.description: A comma-delimited list of extra information to fetch for each returned record. Currently supported fields are:description,license,date_upload,date_taken,owner_name,icon_server,original_format,last_update,geo,tags,machine_tags,o_dims,views,media,path_alias,url_sq,url_t,url_s,url_q,url_m,url_n,url_z,url_c,url_l,url_o

arguments.name: per_page
arguments.description: Number of photos to return per page. If this argument is omitted, it defaults to 100. The maximum allowed value is 500.

arguments.name: page
arguments.description: The page of results to return. If this argument is omitted, it defaults to 1.

response:
<photos page="2" pages="89" perpage="10" total="881">
	<photo id="2636" owner="47058503995@N01" 
		secret="a123456" server="2" title="test_04"
		ispublic="1" isfriend="0" isfamily="0" />
	<photo id="2635" owner="47058503995@N01"
		secret="b123456" server="2" title="test_03"
		ispublic="0" isfriend="1" isfamily="1" />
	<photo id="2633" owner="47058503995@N01"
		secret="c123456" server="2" title="test_01"
		ispublic="1" isfriend="0" isfamily="0" />
	<photo id="2610" owner="12037949754@N01"
		secret="d123456" server="2" title="00_tall"
		ispublic="1" isfriend="0" isfamily="0" />
</photos>

errors.title: Unknown userA user_id was passed which did not match a valid flickr user.
User deletedThe user id passed did not match a Flickr user.
Invalid API KeyThe API key passed was not valid or has expired.
Service currently unavailableThe requested service is temporarily unavailable.
Write operation failedThe requested operation failed due to a temporary issue.
Format "xxx" not foundThe requested response format was not found.
Method "xxx" not foundThe requested method was not found.
Invalid SOAP envelopeThe SOAP envelope send in the request could not be parsed.
Invalid XML-RPC Method CallThe XML-RPC request document could not be parsed.
Bad URL foundOne or more arguments contained a URL that has been used for abuse on Flickr.
